title: KRLIFCSL Candy Molds Ice Cube Trays Chocolate Molds, Silicone Molds Including Cactus, Flamingo, Coconut Tree & Pineapple for Making Ice, Jelly, Chocolate, Soap, Pack of 4 with 2 Droppers. (Multicolor)
features: High-quality Silicone Material: Made of food grade silicone, tasteless, non-toxic, anti-dust, eco-friendly, reusable and durable. it's convenient and safe for you and your family.
Mold Size: 8.5 inch(L) x 4.3 inch(W). Each cavity hight is 0.6~0.8 inch.

Great Value Set: Cute Summer Hawaiian Tropical Rainforest Themed design, the four molds have different colors and shapes: 8-cavity cactus, 10-cavity coconut tree, 15-cavity flamingo, 12 cavity pineapple candy molds. You can make 45 random color candies at a time, save time and save money.

Easy to Use: 2 droppers are very handy, easy to fill liquid into molds. And these molds can be used in the oven, freezer, microwave, etc. They are non-stick, you can easy to pop out candies with good detail shape. After used, if they sit for a minute in hot (soapy) water, they are easily cleaned with a dishwashing brush, rinse, shake water and let air dry. Can even be washed in the dishwasher.

Wide Applications: A perfect gift for your family or love ones. These molds could meet your various needs, they are great for making DIY ice cubes, cake decorating, cupcake topper, hard candy, gummy, gumdrop, chocolate, jello, yogurt sticks, juice, wax, small soap, fruit snack, fruit smoothies and vegetable pops or other freeze pops. Prepare DIY healthy food for camping, beach, picnics, parties , and share with your family and friends.
description: Cactus mold (8 Cavities): 1pc. Coconut tree mold (10 Cavities): 1pc. Pineapple mold (12 Cavities): 1pc. Flamingo mold: (15 Cavities): 1pc.
